about_the_game:
Europa Universalis IV – Sounds from the Community –Kairi Soundtrack

Taking inspiration from the rich tapestry of the Europa Universalis universe, this music pack breaks new ground by being the first ever community produced piece of music for the award winning franchise.

Composed by avid Europa Universalis fan - Kairi Sawler, this collection of five songs is inspired by East-Asian melodies that expand the Europa Universalis gaming experience. From traditional instruments and calming melodies to up-beat percussion this music pack enhances the Europa Universalis listening experience with more beautiful music.

The track list includes:

  • Takeda Sunrise
  • Jade Ambitions
  • Emperor's Road
  • Silken Path
  • Forest Shade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® IV 2.4 GHz eller AMD 3500+
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA® GeForce 8800 or ATI Radeon® X1900, 512mb video memory required
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:2 GB HD space
  • Sound:Direct X- compatible soundcard
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:Controller support: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers. Internet Connection or LAN for multiplayer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® IV 2.4 GHz or AMD 3500+
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA® GeForce 8800 or ATI Radeon® X1900, 1024mb video memory recommended
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:2 GB HD space
  • Sound:Direct X-compatible soundcard
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:Controller support: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers. Internet Connection or LAN for multiplayer
